message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% upfront.
I think I deserve a bit more, 60-40 is still a good deal for you.
Okay, Bob, let's meet in the middle. 55-45, take it or leave it. This is a time-sensitive offer.
I'll meet you closer to the middle, but I still think I deserve a bit more.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  50-50 is the fairest deal.  Take it before inflation eats away at our potential gains!
